item.title: Howto Qmail with spamassassin
item.description: http://sylvestre.ledru.info/howto/howto_qmail_spamassassin.php By Sylvestre Ledru June 2003 Version francaise Return to the linux page (02/04/2002), Bug fix : I just add a little bug fix for some OS which remove the +x on qmail-queue (the qmail-scanner is not concerned) (01/11/2003), Qmail-scanner : I had a new way of calling spamassassin client using qmail-scanner.
